title: Help!!!!!!!
content:
Does anyone know the font for this?

Font: 

 Fontastique 

Solved By: 

 [defiantone](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803064548/http:/typophile.com/user/206966 "View user profile.")

| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-08-29 at 5.05.59 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803064548/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-08-29%20at%205.05.59%20PM.png) | 79.12 KB |
author: jennmertle

comments.content: [Fontastique-Fontastique](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803064548/http:/www.ffonts.net/Fontastique-Fontastique.font) is the font in use, but the more proper thing to do would likely be to use the font i suspect this was based on, [Cocon](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803064548/http:/www.fonts.com/font/fontfont/ff-cocon/collection)
